name: SentinelOne
description: This app integrates with the SentinelOne platform to perform prevention, detection, remediation, and forensics endpoint management tasks.

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

description.default: Black listed hash added through Phantom

actions.description: List all the endpoints/sensors configured on the device
List the running processes on a machine

ip_hostname.description: Hostname/IP of the machine to list processes on

actions.description: Scan an endpoint for dormant threats

ip_hostname.description: Hostname/IP of endpoint to get information

hash.description: Hash of file to remove from blacklist

action.description: Allowed values include: kill, quarantine, un-quarantine, remediate, rollback-remediation
